name: Complete CRUD Endpoints
description: Generate all CRUD endpoints for a resource

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Resource fields (comma-separated, e.g., name, email, age)

prompt: Generate complete CRUD endpoints for {{resource}} in {{language}} using {{database}}. Fields: {{fields}}. Include: GET /api/{{resource}}s (list with pagination), GET /api/{{resource}}s/:id (get by ID), POST /api/{{resource}}s (create), PUT /api/{{resource}}s/:id (update), DELETE /api/{{resource}}s/:id (delete).{{#if auth}} Add JWT authentication middleware.{{/if}} Include input validation and error handling.
